fields.label: Do you have a controller at this site?

If a person other than the site operator determines what materials (if any) are disposed of at this site, that person is a controller. 

A person who is acting purely as an agent or an employee of someone else is not a controller

fields.infoText:
By submitting this registration you confirm that the information you have provided is true and complete. 

If you do not give complete and accurate information, HMRC may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We’ll use this to send you a confirmation email

fields.infoText: This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted registration.

You must check [the guidance for this service](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/landfill-tax-register-and-change-your-details) on GOV.UK to see if you need to fill in and send any additional forms to complete your registration.
##Providing further details

You will need to contact HMRC if you do not use a weighbridge at one or more of your sites (to agree an alternative method for weighing materials).

If you have registered any sites without environmental permits you must also contact us when the permits have been granted (or if they are refused). 

[Contact details](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs/contact/landfill-tax) for Landfill Tax enquiries are available on GOV.UK or you can email, enquiries.eeitts@hmrc.gsi.gov.uk
##Registering as a partnership

If your business is a partnership you must also complete form LT2 to complete your registration. You can access this from [the guidance page for this service](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/landfill-tax-register-and-change-your-details) on GOV.UK.
